ok im 45 mins into in so thought Id take a smoke break and report my review of this file.....not too shabby at ALL considering it's so early in the game,I use vlc and after tweaking a bit with the brightness and all that,its totally watchable..yeah I suppose you could wait for a better release but if you arent picky or (like me) hate horror movie remakes yet feel compelled to watch them to see if they destroyed the franchise or reinvented it but refuse to pay to see it because in hindsight you already did when the original came out.well sir/maam,this aint too bad.thanks uploader

The movie it self was ok but it could of been alot better.

enjoyed what i saw from this cam recorded version!.. 

visuals are watchable but has some scrolling/flashing sections as the movie progesses due to what seems like the video cam that recorded it not being able to handle the transitions between certain clips!.. as far as CAM recorded versions go, this isnt too bad!.. audio rumbles a little when things get a little loud but all in all nothing is missing from the movie!..

@ 420 ....there was nothing good about the movie. As bad as Freddy's Revenge was it was still better than this. I was really bored sitting in the theater watching this. The first NMOES made me scared to fall asleep, this one made look forward to it. And I know Halloween was made by a different director! The point I was making is that movie gets bashed a lot as a remake( I thought it was okay) but it was better than this. That's how bad this movie is. I don't blame Haley's performance, I blame a really bad script, bad directing, and Micheal Bay. An actor can only work with what he's given. The script was absolutely horrible!! It was all over the place, and for the longest time it had no idea who it's main cast were. It really wasn't as smart as the original. As bad as some of the originals were atleast there was some camp value, this doesn't even have that.
There's a reason this movie only has 15% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. I get more scared that I might slip and fall in the shower then I did watching this.

Hey guys, let's keep things in perspective here. It's NMOES, it's a slasher film. It's always had a bad script. Even the very first one, say what you want about it being the best, that's because it's just the best of the worst. Take this for what it is, a remake of a 80's slasher franchise, period. You shouldn't be expecting much to begin with. After seeing this I was actually impressed, as I thought it was going to be much worse than it was. The only thing that made this really bad was the CAM. Watch this when the Rip comes out before you make any serious opinions.

@whatever89nnI know it\'s already been pointed out, but I would like to second it.  It was made clear in the original series that Freddy molested children, too.  Not just killed them.  Infact, that\'s what he was most known and hated for.  Kind like, torturing them until he got tired of it, then killed them.
